We are excited to announce that we recently joined the team at Vemory! http://www.vemory.com In the coming weeks and months we will be working on updating the UI and features of Splice with the help of our awesome user community.

New in this version:
IOS 8 Bug Fixes
- Create and export videos in HD again.
- Trim feature for videos is fixed
- Speed feature bug has been fixed.

Feedback is always welcome. Please contact support@path36.com with any issues or suggestions. Thank you for using Splice.

我们很高兴地宣布，我们已加入 GoPro 并致力于打造世界上最好的移动视频编辑器。

片尾字幕 - 以可选的徽标等完美地结束您的视频

+ GoPro Plus 支持： 访问云中的 GoPro 照片和视频，轻松将它们添加到项目中。
+ 添加 HiLights： 快速查找视频中的最佳瞬间。
+ Dropbox 支持： 只需从 Dropbox 帐户即可导入照片和视频。
+ 全新音乐体验： 现在可以更快查找流行的歌曲和喜欢的音乐流派。

Hi all you lovely creators,
Cue the drumrolls and ceremonial music - here's the moment we've been preparing for over the last few months - a brand new, fully remastered Splice! We're presenting you with a beautiful opportunity to get those creative juices flowing, so let's get started with some exciting filmmaking! We've completely revamped the app so you'll experience it in a totally different way, with a design that is not only beautiful, but also functional and easy to work with. With this update, we're hoping to provide you with the power to perform quick and easy film-editing at your fingertips: with clean cuts, snappy transitions, and a plethora of tools to achieve extra-sharp results.
Don't believe it? Go ahead, try it out and let us know if you feel like Edgar Wright overnight.

With lots of love,
Team Splice

P.S. Over the past months, our team has been committed to creating the best in-app video editing experience for you, and we really hope you like it. If there's something more you'd like to see in the app, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at splice@bendingspoons.com.

Team Splice

P.S. Over the past months, our team has been committed to creating the best in-app video editing experience for you, and we really hope you like it. If there's something more you'd like to see in the app, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at splice@bendingspoons.com.

Hey Splicers! Hope you're having a great summer!
We've updated the app with the following features:
- Highlights: You'll be able to select a few important seconds from the videos you import into your projects
- Enhanced iTunes support
- Imported Music: Support for importing your own audio files
- Smoother timeline interactions
- Project defaults: Animated photos
- Ability to choose frame rate and resolution of your exports
- Apply to all: Ability to apply your edits to all similar elements in the project
- Displaying elapsed time/total time in the project
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Hello Splicers!
How's your January going? We've been quite busy, thanks for asking. ;)
We're going to start the new year off with a bang by introducing some amazing new stuff! We have:
- New and improved transitions (we know you've been asking for these; tell us what you think, leave a review!)
- The ability to detach the audio from video clips (one of our newer engineers worked on this, and it will blow your mind)

This new version also includes several bug fixes and amazing performance improvements (wait till you see how smooth the timeline is!)
So, what are you waiting for? Start creating!

Until next time,
The Splice team

Hola Splicers!
How is everything going? We hope you all are staying safe. These are trying times, and our team has been hard-at-work trying to make Splice the better than the best when it comes to editing your videos.
With this version, we introduce brand new visual effects - get ready to spark up your videos with cool glitches, vintage, and chroma effects! For our new users, the app now offers tooltips to guide you into making your first masterpiece!
We've also revamped the style of the app - have a look! As always, feel free to write to us or leave a review to tell us what you think. We're always looking for ways to improve.

Ciao Splicers!
Hope you're enjoying editing your lovely summer projects with Splice. We've been hard at work to create some new tweak for your masterpieces and add some much-requested features. Here's what's new:
- Split & Duplicate: We have added the possibility to split and duplicate all the timeline elements. Editing will be now smoother than ever.
- Music Section Restyle: the music section has a brand new look and a lot of new amazing features:
1) Now, all music tracks have their duration and artist name next to them. Finally, you can tell your friends who's the genius behind that magic track you use in all your videos!
2) Additionally, Splice now remembers the songs you used in your past projects and suggests them to you in a new category called "Recently Used". Re-using your favorites hits will be super fast!
3) You can now import songs directly from Files;
4) You can now Search among our stock music library.
- More Aspect Ratio: You will be now able to edit in 16:9, 4:5, and 9:16
- More Colors: Pick among a wider selection of colors, or, if our presets are just not enough for you, you can use the shiny new color picker and pick each color on the screen your self!
As always, feel free to write to us and tell us how you like the app, and have a great summer!
Yours,
The Splice team

we've got an early Christmas present to cheer up your festive spirit.
**drum rolls**

Today, we are excited to introduce:
* A brand new UI for the timeline and the panels;
* The support for overlays and picture-in-picture;
* Masks for clips, overlays, text, and effects...

In addition, we improved the HDR support: if your video contains HDR footage you can now choose HDR or SDR at time of export.

Watch out for cool features in the future updates, and don't hesitate to write to splice@bendingspoons.com.

BUG FIXES

Hey there, what’s cracking?

We’ve kicked a couple of bugs to the curb, and now the app’s in sensational shape, even if we do say so ourselves. Performance issues? Not today, buddy.

Want to let us know what you think? Go on, we want to hear from you! splice@bendingspoons.com

Love from the Splice team

SNAP & GRID ON THE PREVIEW

Hello dear Splicers,

We heard you like things nice n Splicey. Well, good job, because we've been busy tweaking this and twiddling that to give you the Spliciest possible in-app experience.
With this update the elements in the preview snap to the edges of the canvas. And…
The grid is back! Now crop and rotate with the grid to guide you in the preview again!

Love from the Splice team

NEW ROYALTY FREE MUSIC LIBRARY

Hello dear Splicers,

You asked us for more music and so here we are. More music, more categories. What's more, it's all royalty free! We have added a mic icon for songs with vocals, and added a preview of the whole track within the music player while browsing!

Still don't find what you are looking for? Try our multiple keyword search to see if that is any help, otherwise you can always write to us for more!

Happy editing!

Love from the Splice team

MOVE CLIPS FROM OVERLAY TO TIMELINE WITH YOUR FINGER

Hey there, awesome creators!

Many of you have asked why you can't move a clip from overlay back to the timeline by dragging it with your finger.

SPOILER ALERT:
Now you can!

Yup, you can now drag clips up, down, back up again, and down once more for good measure. It couldn't be easier!

If you have any feedback, don't hesitate to reach out at splice@bendingspoons.com.

Love from the Splice team

MUTE THE VIDEO IN 1 TAP!

Now, you can quickly mute your whole video with just a tap of a button. And for the more demanding, there is also the possibility of muting single clips: just go inside the Volume tab of the clip, and press on the Mute button.

Pro tip: you can do it also from the shortcut menu. Just tap on a selected clip and tap the mute icon ;)
